channel.title: Mjpg Streamer on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Mjpg Streamer on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: running mjpg-streamer on a Raspberry Pi 2 with an old Logitech webcam
item.description: I followed the instructions on this post on LinuxMediaServer.net to get an old Logitech web camera running on a Raspberry Pi 2. Here are some of the changes I did from the original to support my hardware. lsusb returns this device: Bus 001 Device 004: ID 046d:08ae Logitech, Inc. QuickCam for Notebooks I had to add a driver for the camera: sudo modprobe gspca_zc3xx The camera I have shows up as /dev/video0 and has a resolution of 320x240:
